DOC.brief_title: Identifying Expression Markers Cumulus Cells Identify Oocyte Developmental Potential Through Maturation Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: In ART , one major obstacle encounter patient wide variation follicular size oocyte pick-up day consequently , number available mature oocytes number competent embryos implantation . The follicular size day oocyte pick-up reflect synchronicity individual follicular responsiveness FSH . For successful preimplantation development embryo , oocyte must contain necessary maternal factor . Two factor specific mRNA transcript ( GDF9 , PTX3 , HAS2 , PTGS2 , TNFAIP6 ) microRNA ( miR-224 ) . For Cumulus Oocyte Complex , evaluation embryo development morphokinetics correlate expression implantation data identify quantitative biomarker predict embryo high chance implantation patient . Experimental Design : 1 . - Collection Cumulus Oocyte Complex ( COC ) patient 2 . - Separation oocytes accord size follicule retrieve ( < 17mm ; ≥17mm ) 3 . - Isolation mRNA group cumulus cell 4 . - Expression study , qRT-PCR ( GDF9 , PTX3 , HAS2 , PTGS2 , TNFAIP6 ) 5 . - Analysis miR-224 , negative regulator cumulus expansion via PTX3 6 . - Time-lapse culture & evaluation morphokinetics
DOC.criteria: No 2 previous treatment cycle No history recurrent spontaneous abortion Age ≤ 39 year BMI < 30 kg / m2 ≥ 8 cumulusoocytecomplexes ( COC ) retrieve human Chorionic Gonadotrophin ( hCG ) trigger Preimplantaion Genetic Diagnosis ( PGD ) Preimplantation Genetics Screening ( PGS ) indication Maximum number 24 COC pickup Failure culture Day 5 Polycystic ovary syndrome Severe endometrial factor influence implantation Uterine malformation congenital anomaly Severe male factor ( Azoospermia )
